articles.title: Meeting of Greeting Sun Takes Place at Top of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Meeting of Greeting Sun Takes Place at Top of Mt. Paektu
Samjiyon, August 14 (KCNA) -- The 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu started.
					 The festival is an international meeting dynamically encouraging the world progressive people's struggle for adding shine to the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, holding in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the sun of the 21st century and building a just, peaceful and fresh world.
					
					 A meeting of greeting the sun took place at the top of Mt. Paektu on Monday.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is honorary chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the vice-chairpersons of the Korean Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Peter Woods, ambassador of the United Cities and Local Governments-Asia Pacific, Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, who are co-chairpersons of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, delegations and delegates of various countries, regions and international democratic organizations, personages of various circles and staff members of foreign embassies in Pyongyang.
					
					 Neil Fitzgerald, co-chairman of the Oceania Regional Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, read out the 2017 Paektusan declaration at the meeting.
					
					 The declaration praised the exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said:
					
					 1. The great HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il are the sun of humankind alive with the era of independence.
					
					   We will laud HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to accomplishing the global cause of independence as the sun of Juche and Songun forever and further develop the festival into the political and cultural one common to humankind to add shine to the great idea and exploits of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 2. Respected HE Kim Jong Un is the great sun of the 21st century who is leading the global cause of independence to brilliant victory.
					
					   We are convinced that thanks to HE Kim Jong Un who is holding the helm of world politics, the 21st century will be glorified as the great century of Kim Jong Un in which domination, subordination, aggression and interference are eradicated and sovereignty and equality of all countries ensured and the genuine international justice realized.
					
					 3. The great Paektusan nation is the banner of victory dynamically accelerating the global independence with the might of justice and truth.
					
					 We will more dynamically conduct activities for support to the great Paektusan nation, fortress of independence against imperialism and bulwark of socialism, which is dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism while vigorously smashing all sorts of challenges in history.
					
					 The future of humankind is rosy and bright and the historic cause of building a new independent world will be certainly accomplished thanks to the great sun rising in high spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 After the declaration was read out, Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea who is vice-chairman of the Guinean Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and Argentinean writer Jorge Luis Ubertali recited their impromptu poems praising the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The participants in the meeting signed the placard that read the letters "Glory to the powerful Paektusan nation!", with full conviction that the future of mankind is bright and rosy and the global cause of independence will be certainly accomplished thanks to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The participants marched to the tune of song "We Will Go to Mt Paektu" holding such placards as "Long live General Kim Jong Un, the sun of the 21st century" and festive flags.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets High-ranking Leader of Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist)
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets High-ranking Leader of Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist)
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Monday had a talk with Madav Kumar Nepal, honorary chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and high-ranking leader of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who is participating in the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Cambodian Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Cambodian Party Delegation Here
Pyongyang, August 14 -- A delegation of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia led by Vice-Chairman Chap Nhalyvoud arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Festival Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Paektusan Secret Camp
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Festival Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Paektusan Secret Camp
Samjiyon, August 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu visited leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp on Monday.
					 They placed a floral basket and bouquets at the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt Paektu there and paid tribute to them.
					
					 In the yard of the old home, they recollected the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They went round the headquarters log cabin, quarters for guerrillas, a well used by anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk, etc.
					
					 Prior to this, they toured the Samjiyon Grand Monument which conveys the anti-Japanese revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: KCU Members Vow to Turn Out in All-People Resistance
articles.content:
KCU Members Vow to Turn Out in All-People Resistance
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations took place at the plaza of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on Monday to resolutely smash the U.S. imperialists' reckless nuclear war hysteria.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Kim Su Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials of the youth league and members of the KCU.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report at the meeting and then followed speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers condemned the UN "sanctions resolution", cooked up by the U.S. imperialists and their followers, as the most barbarous crime aimed to prevent happy laughter and reading of the Korean schoolchildren from being heard.
					
					 They said that the despicable moves of the enemies, scared by the DPRK's ICBM test-launch, redoubles the KCU members' pride and faith in the great Paektusan nation's inexhaustible might and final victory and hardens their strong will to defend the country and annihilate the enemies.
					
					 They declared that if the U.S. imperialists bring clouds of a war to hang over Korea, the youngsters will take arms and participate in the sacred war of revenge to clearly show the mettle of the true sons and daughters of the socialist motherland and juvenile revolutionaries.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Tour Revolutionary Sites in Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Tour Revolutionary Sites in Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK made study tour of the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site and the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site on Sunday.
					 In Pochonbo, they placed bouquets at the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing on the side of Karim Stream and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum, the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, the police sub-station, the sub-county office and other sites, after being briefed on the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 The marchers went through the Spring Site in Poso-ri to the Tableland of Junghung bearing the records of the revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, they grasped the feats of Kim Jong Il who pioneered the first study tour to Mt Paektu and transformed the revolutionary battle sites around Mt Paektu into the strong base for education in the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 That evening they had a meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas while billeting in the field.
					
					 On August 14, they visited Chongbong bivouacs where the statue of the President is placed and Konchang and Pegae Hill bivouacs and went round the historic relics such as the place where anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk boiled rice and the site of campfire and slogan-bearing trees.
					
					 After arriving in the Samjiyon County, they vowed to accelerate the victorious advance of socialism under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in front of the Samjiyon Grand Monument and the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the county.
					
					 At the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum they looked round the photos of peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and historic data on display. They also toured the Samthogong log cabin and the lodging quarters of visitors to the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 That day, the deputies presented aid materials to those involved in the project to spruce up Samjiyon County and did labor with them.

articles.title: Rallies of Peasants and Women Held to Hail Support DPRK Government Statement
articles.content:
Rallies of Peasants and Women Held to Hail Support DPRK Government Statement
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Members of the Union of Agricultural Workers and the Socialist Women's Union in the DPRK met at the Okdo Co-op Farm in Ryonggang County, Nampho City and the plaza of the Tower of the Juche Idea in Pyongyang on Sunday and Monday to support the statement of the DPRK Government.
					 Present there were officials concerned and officials of the unions.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK Government was read out at the rallies before speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed absolute support to the statement of the government which solemnly declared it would settle accounts with the U.S. for its hideous crimes against the DPRK and the Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK's access to the strongest nuclear force is a legitimate step for self-defense taken to defend the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence from the gangster-like U.S. imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices, they stressed.
					
					 They scathingly denounced the UNSC "sanctions resolution" as a hideous unethical crime unprecedented in history.
					
					 They said that the "resolution" cooked up by the U.S., the worst rogue state in the world, is no more than a last-ditch effort of those frightened at the might of the DPRK which rose to the high strategic position as a nuclear power of Juche and world-level military power.
					
					 They underscored the need to go all out for the final victory of socialism under the banner of the great Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, rallied closer around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Shameless Defeats U.S. Suffered in Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Shameless Defeats U.S. Suffered in Confrontation with DPRK
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The successive U.S. presidents were fated to suffer bitter defeats in their provocations for aggression and war against the DPRK.
					 Truman ignited a war of aggression against the two year-old DPRK on June 25, 1950, but drained the cup of shameless defeats in the whole course of the war.
					
					 After succeeding Truman as the U.S. president, Eisenhower made every desperate effort to roll back the tide of war, but the Korean war ended in the great victory of the heroic Korean people led by President Kim Il Sung, iron-willed commander, on July 27, 1953.
					
					 When the U.S. spy ship "Pueblo" was captured by the navy of the Korean People's Army on January 23, 1968, the U.S. shrunk back from the tough stand of the DPRK army and people, who declared they would react to the U.S. "retaliation" with stronger counteraction and to the total war with all-out war, and had to made a written apology to the DPRK. 
					
					 At that time, U.S. President Johnson deplored that it was the one and only written apology the U.S. made in its history. And Washington Post reported the U.S. got a bloody nose by a small country.
					
					 Nixon, oblivious of the lesson drawn from the "Pueblo" incident, fomented the EC-121 incident in April 1969 just after winning the presidency and Ford provoked the Panmunjom incident on August 18, 1976 in a bid to concoct an excuse for the start of a new war against the DPRK, all of which resulted in U.S. failure.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Saber-rattling Will Lead to Self-ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Saber-rattling Will Lead to Self-ruin: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department on August 11 announced that the U.S.-south Korea joint military drill Ulji Freedom Guardian would start on August 21 as scheduled.
					 It declared it would send nuclear carrier strike groups, nuclear strategic submarine and other war hardware to the Korean peninsula in advance and dispatch 12 F-16 fighters and huge armed forces to the U.S. bases in south Korea for the drill.
					
					 Shortly ago, the commander-in-chief of the U.S. forces and the south Korean chief executive had phone talks over the joint military drill.
					
					 It is clear what does the start of large nuclear war drill mean under the worst situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric they let out about "annual, regular and defensive drills", they cannot cover up the danger of a war outbreak.
					
					 If any accidental case would be sparked, though unwanted, it would never avert a war.
					
					 What matters is that when a second Korean war breaks out, it would be a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK has already declared in the statement of its government that it would not hesitate to use any form of ultimate means.
					
					 The U.S. should think twice about the consequences.
					
					 The Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army announced that it would finally complete the plan for enveloping fire at Guam until mid August and report it to the commander-in-chief of the DPRK Nuclear Force and wait for his order.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK is strong in its guts and no one can guess its muscle as the flight trajectory of medium-to-long ballistic rocket Hwasong-12, firing data and the correct hitting-point are made public at home and abroad.
					
					 Within three days after the publication of the statement of the DPRK government, nearly 3.5 million youth and students and working people volunteered to join or rejoin in the Korean People's Army. This fact clearly shows the will of the Korean people to finally conclude the standoff with U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. goes reckless by wielding a nuclear stick before its rival armed with nukes despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, it would precipitate its self-destruction.
					
					 We are watching every move of the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. against Reckless Acts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. against Reckless Acts
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. brought into the sky above south Korea a B-1B formation to conduct the exercises of mounting a sudden preemptive attack on strategic targets of the DPRK.
					 It is also actively pushing forward the plan for deploying B-52, B-1B, B-2A and other strategic assets and F-22 Stealth fighter formations in south Korea. In the sea they plan to let group of warships including two nuclear carrier task groups and nuclear submarine make their way into the waters off the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says this is a reckless fit of those unaware of their fate plunging into the abyss of ruin.
					
					 Saying that the army and people of the DPRK view the U.S. military acts as nothing but a bluffing stemming from fear, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Through the successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 shortly ago, the DPRK clearly showed the world that it is capable of attacking any part of the U.S. mainland through sudden surprise opening of fire from any place and at any time.
					
					 It is the fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK to wipe out the enemies to the last man so that they would not be left even a man who would sign the surrender document as they try to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK and the right to existence of the nation.
					
					 The U.S. should pay heed to the statement of the DPRK government that we would not rule out the use of any final means.
					
					 Reckless and wild acts of the U.S. can accelerate its final ruin.

articles.title: Probe into Crimes Committed by S. Korean IS Urged
articles.content:
Probe into Crimes Committed by S. Korean IS Urged
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- New facts proving the crimes the puppet Intelligence Service committed by making illegal intervention in all sorts of elections through the operation of "civilian public opinion team" comprising more than 3 500 persons have been recently disclosed to the great furor of the public in south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says the recent revelation of the criminal data of IS clearly proves that the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye conservative groups who seized the posts of "president" are a group of worst political philistines and dirty swindlers.
					
					 What matters is that the conservative group including the "Liberal Korea Party" is challenging the candlelight demonstrators, instead of apologizing for its crimes, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The conservative forces of south Korea are vociferating about the need "to cope with abolition of evils" by putting in motion the "special committee for checking the retrogressive revision of the Intelligence Service", which reminds one of a guilty party filing the suit first. This is last ditch efforts of those trying to hush up the case. But it is too late.
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life are demanding a probe into  truth behind the case, saying that "body was that of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye" and they "turned IS into Gestapo".

articles.title: Rampant Human Rights Abuses within S. Korean Puppet Army Disclosed
articles.content:
Rampant Human Rights Abuses within S. Korean Puppet Army Disclosed
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released an inquiry report on Monday to give a detailed account of the recent serious human rights abuses within the south Korean puppet army.
					 According to the report, a large number of suicides were witnessed within the frontline puppet army units in Kangwon Province of south Korea this year alone.
					
					 The report said:
					
					 Typically, a soldier hung himself by a tree to death on January 26 in Kosong area and a sergeant shot himself to death on the beach on April 10.  A recruit was found dead in Cholwon area and a soldier shot himself to death in Hwachon County in May.
					
					 On August 9 a soldier was found dead with gunshot wound in a frontline unit in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province.
					
					 According to extremely curtailed data published by the puppet military, the number of soldiers now suffering from hypochondria and wanting to leave the army has reached more than 85 000.
					
					 Specifically, there are at least 80 000 "trouble-making and dangerous soldiers" who are apt to commit suicide or shooting spree within the army units alone.
					
					 Evil doers openly go on a rampage within the military in broad daylight. In July last a "feeding torture" case that occurred in a unit of the marines stunned the public. Wolf-like superiors reportedly fed a recruit in a forcible manner to increase his weight to 90 kg and threatened to kill him if he vomited the food he had eaten.
					
					 A lawmaker affiliated to the Legislation and Judiciary Committee of the "National Assembly" of south Korea made public information submitted by a military court, which said one soldier is found dead in every four days within the puppet army and 70 percent of them are suicides.
					
					 According to a written inquiry conducted by the human rights center of the puppet army into 100 women soldiers and officers, one of the five suffered sexual abuses.
					
					 Now the puppet army is plagued by the idea of "single golden chance" of the brass hats for getting windfall gains. Against this backdrop, human rights abuses are getting more serious within the puppet army as a "military mafia" is reigning over it.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean regime is getting desperate in the racket for escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north, far from tackling the serious human rights problems within the puppet army. 
					
					 It provokes only side-splitting laughter that the regime is trying to pit the pack of depraved soldiers against the world's strongest army possessed of the invincible nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: Nationwide Anti-U.S. Resistance Called for
articles.content:
Nationwide Anti-U.S. Resistance Called for
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement Monday called for raising higher the flame of nationwide anti-U.S resistance.
					 The statement said that the south Koreans and overseas compatriots have courageously turned out in anti-U.S. resistance to cope with the U.S. imperialists and the warmongers at home and abroad keen on inflicting the holocaust of nuclear war on this land. The statement extended full support and solidarity to them.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about a "preventive war" and a "preemptive attack on the north" while egging the south Korean puppet warmongers on to them as part of war provocation hysteria. But this is never to "defend" south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This is the revelation of the sinister intention of the American colonialists to exterminate the Korean nation, turn the whole Korean peninsula into a base to realize their strategy for putting Northeast Asia under their control.
					
					 The U.S. cooked up the UN "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK while viciously faulting the DPRK's just measures for bolstering nuclear force for self-defence. This is aimed to foster mistrust, antagonism, hostility and confrontation among Koreans, hinder national reconciliation and unity and prevent the independent reunification of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy as they extremely threaten the sovereignty and the right to existence of the Koreans and the common prosperity of the nation after dividing the Korean nation into two and as they stand in the way of the national reunification, the supreme desire of the nation.
					
					 All the Korean people will wage a nationwide anti-U.S. resistance and certainly settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists committing all crimes against the Korean nation and the south Korean authorities going reckless without reason while acting a shock brigade in executing the U.S. traitorous and criminal moves for putting sanctions against the DPRK and stifling it.
					
					 The Koreans from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad should raise higher the flame of nationwide anti-U.S. resistance to resolutely foil the U.S. imperialists' nuclear war moves against the north and realize the independent reunification of the country as early as possible through the great unity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Committee Inaugurated in Nigeria to Revere Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Committee Inaugurated in Nigeria to Revere Great Persons of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A committee for revering the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu was formed in Abuja, Nigeria on August 5.
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to conduct brisk activities for giving publicity to the exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Nigerian Figures Praise Great Men of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Nigerian Figures Praise Great Men of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were lauded by Nigerian personages.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, at an inaugural ceremony of the committee for revering the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu held in Abuja on August 5, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung always found himself among the people, throwing in his lot with them.
					
					 The U.S. claimed it was impossible for the DPRK to rise on its feet within a hundred years after the Korean War, but the Korean people completed reconstruction in three years and accomplished the historic task of industrialization in a brief span of fourteen years, firmly united around their leader.
					
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, noted that Kim Jong Il bolstered the country's defense capabilities in every way under the uplifted banner of Songun to cope with the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK. Kim Jong Il prevented a war on the Korean peninsula, defended the destiny of the Korean nation and put the position of the DPRK onto the highest level with his outstanding leadership, he added.

articles.title: Bangleshi People Hail DPRK's Successful Second ICBM Test-launch
articles.content:
Bangleshi People Hail DPRK's Successful Second ICBM Test-launch
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the Bangladesh People's League and the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Aug. 1 hailing the DPRK's success in the second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The statement warmly congratulated the DPRK on its success in the second test-launch of ICBM to hit hard the U.S. and demonstrate the might of the strategic nuclear force before the world.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK successful second test-launch of ICBM was meant to send the U.S. recklessly making bluff a warning that if it dares to provoke the DPRK, the U.S., a state of aggression, can never be safe.
					
					 The world people are struck with deep admiration for HE Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people, as he is demonstrating the unshakable faith and spirit of offensive by nuclear thunder of justice with which he is dealing merciless blows at the U.S. imperialists making desperate efforts to get rid of the abyss of ruin crying out for a war and the extreme sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 We are fully confidant that the Korean people will achieve a final victory in the showdown with imperialism and the U.S. and in the building of a powerful socialist country under his wise leadership by ceaselessly bolstering up the powerful nuclear deterrent for the sovereignty of the country, the nation's right to existence and the happiness of all generations to come despite the outrageous challenges of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 We send invariable support and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Egyptian, Kuwaiti Bodies Express Solidarity with Korean People
articles.content:
Egyptian, Kuwaiti Bodies Express Solidarity with Korean People
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Egyptian and Kuwaiti social organizations made public statements on July 30 and 31 hailing the DPRK's successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 It was a legitimate right for the DPRK to possess ICBMs and other ultra-modern military hardware for defending itself from the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces hell-bent on unleashing a war.
					
					 Now that the law of the jungle governs and the U.S. is styling itself "Interpol", the tremendous military deterrent of the DPRK is a reliable treasured sword for defending the peace.
					
					 The DPRK is exercising its legitimate right to defend itself, countering the moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 We condemn the action of the UN following the U.S., regarding the moves of the U.S. as crimes.
					
					 We send full support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle for reliably defending the peace and security of the Korean peninsula, the region and the world.
					
					 The Kuwaiti Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said that no matter how vicious imperialists' sanctions and pressure campaign are, they would not prevent the dynamic advance of the DPRK, adding that it will surely win victory in the final confrontation with imperialists thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Access to Nukes Is Just Step for Self-Defense: Beninese Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Access to Nukes Is Just Step for Self-Defense: Beninese Bodies
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's access to nukes was the just measure for self-defense for defending the sovereignty of the country and its right to existence from the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. which has resorted to the extreme policy hostile to the DPRK and nuclear threats and blackmail to it for over half a century.
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Aug. 8.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. had the UNSC cook up a "sanctions resolution" aimed at completely preventing the economic development of the DPRK and the improvement of the people's standard of living, describing the ICBM test-fire as a "threat to the international peace and security."
					
					 We demand the U.S. properly understand the strategic position of the DPRK and stop the sanctions campaign against it.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people who are united close behind Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un will register greater successes in the struggle for building a powerful socialist country and reunifying the country, holding fast to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, the everlasting banner of defending the peace.
					
					 We express support for the struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la acogida del sol en el monte Paektu
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la acogida del sol en el monte Paektu
Samjiyon, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Comenzo el 5o Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu.
					Esta cita internacional servira para estimular la lucha de los pueblos progresistas del mundo por glorificar la vida y hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, enaltecer al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un como Sol del siglo 21 y construir un nuevo mundo justo y pacifico.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en la cima del monte Paektu la acogida del sol.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente honorario del Comite Preparatorio Internacional para el Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu de 2017, los vicepresidentes del comite preparatorio coreano para el mismo congreso y los copresidentes del comite preparatorio internacional; Peter Woods, embajador de la Asociacion de Ciudades y Gobiernos Locales en la region de Asia-Pacifico; Damian Ogbonna, presidente nacional del Partido Progresivo del Pueblo de Nigeria; Fumihiro Himori, presidente del Comite Japones de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Independiente y Pacifica de Corea; Viktor Petrov, presidente de la Asociacion Rusa de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y Anders Kristensen, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Dinamarca-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Se distinguian tambien las delegaciones, los delegados, las personalidades de diversos sectores de varios paises, regiones y entidades democraticas internacionales y los miembros de representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises en Corea.
					
					Neil Fitzgerald, copresidente del comite preparatorio regional de Oceania para el mismo congreso, dio lectura a la Declaracion del monte Paektu de 2017.
					
					El documento encomia las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y declara los siguientes puntos:
					
					1. Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il son el Sol de la humanidad que esta siempre presente junto con la epoca de independencia. 
					
					 Elogiando siempre como el Sol del Juche y del Songun a Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung y a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il quienes hicieron imborrable aporte a la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo, desarrollaremos el Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu como evento politico-cultural comun de la humanidad que sirva de espacio para glorificar la idea y hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales. 
					
					2. Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un es el gran Sol del siglo XXI que conduce a la fulminante victoria la causa de la humanidad por la independencia. 
					
					Estamos seguros de que gracias a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, timonel de la politica mundial, el siglo 21 brillara como el de Kim Jong Un en que se pondra punto final a la dominacion y subyugacion, agresion y la intervencion, se garantizaran la soberania y la igualdad de todos los paises y se lograra la verdadera justicia internacional. 
					
					3. La potencia Paektusan es la bandera de victoria que impulsa la verificacion de la independencia en todo el mundo con la fuerza de justicia y verdad. 
					
					Desarrollaremos con osadia las actividades para apoyar y solidarizarse con la potencia Paektusan, baluarte de la independencia antiimperialista y del socialismo que avanza con pasos firmes por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo frustrando todos los desafios de la historia. 
					
					Gracias al gran Sol con el impetu majestuoso del monte Paektu, se le abre un horizonte amplio y prometedor a la humanidad y cumplira sin falta la historica causa de construccion de un nuevo mundo independiente. 
					
					Terminada la lectura de la declaracion, Abdoulaye Diallo, presidente de la Sociedad Guinea de Estudio de la Idea Literaria del Juche y vicepresidente del comite preparatorio guineo para el congreso, y el escritor argentino Jorge Luis Ubertali recitaron las poesias improvisadas elogiando a los grandes hombres. 
					
					Los participantes dejaron sus firmas en una pancarta escrita como "!Gloria a la potencia Paektusan!" con la conviccion de que gracias a la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un es prospero infinitamente el  futuro de la humanidad y se lograra sin falta el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia en el mundo.
					
					Y ellos marcharon al son de la cancion "Iremos al monte Paektu" levantando en las manos las pancartas en que estan escritas la consigna "!Viva el General Kim Jong Un, Sol del siglo XXI!" y otras y las banderas del festival.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con Madav Kumar Nepal
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con Madav Kumar Nepal
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 14 con Madav Kumar Nepal, dirigente de alto rango del Partido Comunista Nepales (Marxista-Leninista) y presidente honorario del Comite Preparatorio Internacional para el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017 quien participa en el V Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu.

articles.title: Portavoz del comite norteno llama a dinamizar la lucha antiyanqui
articles.content:
Portavoz del comite norteno llama a dinamizar la lucha antiyanqui
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion llamando a dar mas intensidad a la sagrada lucha antiyanqui de dimension pannacional.
					El documento recuerda que indignados por la fiebre belica de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas internos y externos deseosos de imponer los desastres de guerra nuclear, los habitantes surcoreanos y los compatriotas en ultramar se levantan ahora en la sagrada lucha antiyanqui.
					
					Tras expresar el apoyo total y solidaridad a esa lucha, el documento continua:
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. esta enloquecido por provocar la guerra azuzando a los belicistas titeres surcoreanos con expresiones "guerra preventiva" y "ataque preventivo anti-Norte (de Corea)". 
					
					El objetivo que persiguen los colonialistas americanos no es "defender" el Sur de Corea, sino exterminar a la nacion coreana y convertir toda la Peninsula Coreana en el punto de apoyo para el cumplimiento de su estrategia de dominar el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					EE.UU. fabrico hasta la inaudita "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC de la ONU cuestionando obstinadamente las justas y autodefensivas medidas de incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC. Es que quiere impedir la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion independiente de Corea al sembrar la desconfianza, antipatia, hostilidad y enfrentamiento entre los coreanos.
					
					El imperio americano es el enemigo jurado que dividio en dos a la nacion coreana, amenaza al extremo la soberania y el derecho a existencia de los coreanos e impide en todo lo posible la reunificacion de la patria, deseo mas grande de la nacion.
					
					Mediante la sagrada lucha antiyanqui, toda la nacion coreana ajustara sin falta las cuentas de los crimenes cometidos por EE.UU. en contra de la nacion coreana y de los actos demenciales de las autoridades surcoreanas que se ponen al frente de la antinacional y criminal campana norteamericana para sancionar y aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					Unidos bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", los habitantes de diferentes sectores del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben intensificar la sagrada lucha antiyanqui para lograr cuanto antes la reunificacion independiente de la patria frustrando tajantemente la campana de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de los imperialistas yanquis.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines provinciales en apoyo a la declaracion de gobierno de RPDC
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines provinciales en apoyo a la declaracion de gobierno de RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 13 los mitines de las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte, Kangwon y Ryanggang y la ciudad de Nampho para apoyar la declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, con la participacion de los funcionarios de los organos del partido, el Poder y la economia, las entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de las respectivas localidades.
					En las ocasiones, se dio lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC y hubo discursos de los vicepresidentes de los comites provinciales y ciudadano del partido y de los representantes de obreros, trabajadores agricolas, intelectuales y jovenes.
					
					Los oradores apoyaron unanimemente la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC que rechazo totalmente la "resolucion de sancion", inventada ilegalmente por EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Y condenaron como inaudito acto terrorista de Estado imperdonable la locura bandidesca de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas enemigas que fabricaron la "resolucion de sancion" abusando de la ONU al acusar el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU., que se autodenomina como "unica superpotencia mundial", inventa tal documento sucio y criminal sin atrever a tocar a la RPDC movilizando a todas sus lacayunas, hecho que comprueba claramente la justeza de la linea de desarrollo paralelo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, apuntaron.
					
					Subrayaron que gracias a tener al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y la unidad mas poderosa que el arma nuclear, no temen a cualquier enemigo potente de nuestro planeta y la victoria final esta siempre al lado de la RPDC.
					
					Actos seguidos hubo manifestaciones de masas.

articles.title: Efectuado acto nacional de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado acto nacional de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el patio de educacion del Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria el acto nacional de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC) para frustrar rotundamente el belicismo nuclear de EE.UU.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, Kim Su Gil, presidente del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud y los miembros de la ONC.
					
					El primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam, presento el informe y otros intervinieron.
					
					Los oradores condenaron que la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU, fabricada por EE.UU. y sus seguidores, es el acto criminal mas barbaro para acabar con la vida feliz y el derecho al estudio de los ninos coreanos.
					
					El perfil de los enemigos atemorizados ante el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental de la RPDC nos hace sentirnos mas orgullosos del inagotable poderio de la potencia Paektusan y mas convencidos de la victoria final y nos multiplica la voluntad de defender la patria exterminando a los enemigos, recalcaron.
					
					Si el imperialismo norteamericano desata la guerra en la tierra patria, tomaremos las armas para la batalla de venganza y lucharemos con coraje demostrando el temperamento de hijos verdaderos y revolucionarios pequenos de la patria socialista, finalizaron.

articles.title: ACNC advierte sobre las consecuencias de Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
ACNC advierte sobre las consecuencias de Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 11, el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos anuncio que de acuerdo con lo programado, iniciara el 21 de agosto el ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					Para esa maniobra, despachara con antelacion a la Peninsula Coreana las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares, el submarino estrategico nuclear y otros medios de guerra y reforzara a la base militar norteamericana en el Sur de Corea 12 cazas F-16 y muchos efectivos.
					
					Hace poco, debatieron por telefono los detalles del entrenamiento el presidente norteamericano y el mandatario surcoreano.
					
					Esta claro el significado del inicio de los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de gran dimension cuando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta empeorada al extremo.
					
					Aunque los provocadores hablan mucho de que son "ejercicios anuales, regulares y defensivos", no pueden restar nunca los peligros de guerra que entranan.
					
					Si ocurre de modo accidental cualquier minimo caso de choque, ninguna fuerza podra detener la guerra.
					
					El problema es que si se desata la segunda guerra coreana, esta se extendera sin falta a la nuclear.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ya publico la declaracion de su gobierno apuntando que no vacilara en usar cualquier recurso final.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia.
					
					Las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea anunciaron su posicion de que completaran el proyecto de fuego para asediar la isla Guam hasta la segunda decena de agosto, lo entregaran al Comandante en Jefe de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC y esperaran la orden de el manteniendo el estado de espera de lanzamiento.
					
					Nadie puede evaluar el poderio de ellas que dieron a la publicidad hasta la trayectoria de vuelo, los datos de disparo y el punto de correcto de caida del cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance "Hwasong-12".
					
					Solo en 3 dias despues de publicada la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC, 3 millones y medio de jovenes, estudiantes y trabajadores solicitaron incorporarse al EPC o la repeticion del servicio militar, lo que muestra claramente la voluntad del pueblo coreano de llevar a cabo la batalla de enfrentamiento antiyanqui.
					
					EE.UU. adelantara su autodestruccion si continua esgrimiendo el garrote nuclear ante el rival poseedor del arma nuclear desestimando las reiteradas advertencias de este.
					
					La RPDC esta observando con vigilancia cada movimiento de EE.UU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios de ataque sorpresivo de los bombarderos B-1B
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicios de ataque sorpresivo de los bombarderos B-1B
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos realizo el entrenamiento de golpe sorpresivo y preventivo a los blancos estrategicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con la escuadrilla de bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-1B introducida en el cielo surcoreano.
					Por otra parte, impulsa en etapa crucial el plan para emplazar en el Sur de Corea las propiedades estrategicas, incluyendo B-52, B-1B y B-2A, y las escuadrillas de cazas Stealth F-22.
					
					Ademas, dos flotillas de portaaviones nucleares, el submarino nuclear y otros piratas yanquis se preparan para trasladarse a las aguas de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una guaperia de quienes no conocen todavia en que atolladero han caido.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de Corea consideran las referidas acciones militares de EE.UU. como fanfarronada para disimular el miedo.
					
					A traves del exito en el reciente segundo lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14", la RPDC demostro claramente a todo el mundo que puede golpear todo el territorio norteamericano con el lanzamiento inesperado y sorpresivo en cualesquier region, lugar y tiempo.
					
					Propinar una lluvia de bombas nucleares a los agresores, que intentan violar la soberania del pais y suprimir el derecho a la existencia de la nacion, y eliminar hasta el ultimo para que no puedan firmar ni el acta de capitulacion siquiera, esto es la voluntad invariable del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Volvemos a advertir a EE.UU. que escuche con seriedad la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC de que empleara cualquier recurso final.
					
					La imprudencia puede adelantar la destruccion definitiva de EE.UU.
